thread.title: Kangana Ranaut threatened to slap Sugandha Mishra for mimicking her: Did she mean it?
thread.title_full: Kangana Ranaut threatened to slap Sugandha Mishra for mimicking her: Did she mean it?

author: IANS
title: Kangana Ranaut threatened to slap Sugandha Mishra for mimicking her: Did she mean it?
text:
Kangana Ranaut threatened to slap Sugandha Mishra for mimicking her: Did she mean it? IANS Feb, 18 2017 11:49:49 IST 
Mumbai : Comedienne-actress Sugandha Mishra had an awkward encounter on TV show The Voice India Season 2 when she tried to mimic National Award-winning actress Kangana Ranaut in her presence. Kangana Ranaut. File photo 
Kangana along with co-actor Shahid Kapoor had appeared on the show to promote her upcoming film Rangoon . 
Singers Salim Merchant and Shaan, who appear as coaches on the show, goaded Sugandha to mimic Kangana while she was present as a guest. 
To that, Kangana said: "I feel like slapping her." 
A source from the set said: "It was a tense moment after Kangana's shocking statement. It was awkward for Sugandha, but she took it in a sporting spirit and continued with the shoot." 
The Voice India Season 2 is aired on &TV. 
Previously, during the shooting of The Kapil Sharma Show , Shah Rukh Khan too had left Sugandha in tears when he told her that she is a bad performer and should refrain from dancing. He later clarified that he had been joking, and cheered Sugandha up. 
We're of the view that Kangana was probably just playing a prank on Sugandha too.
